venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
We have two simultaneous sessions this month:

Dev/Design:

Unpack WordPress Today! (WordPress Out of the Box)

We have to think outside of the box if we are going to be able to harness the full power of WordPress. We can build directory sites, job boards, inspirational sites, social networks and more with WordPress.  The key here is leveraging plugins, inherit WordPress functionality and features so we aren't creating more work for ourselves and getting our sites live before our competitors do.

Presented by Jesse Friedman

Jesse has a unique adoration for the web, the industry and our community. He is the Director of Web Development at Neal Advertising & Karboodle, Professor at Johnson & Wales University and Samurai at SWORD Studios.

http://jesserfriedman.com/
http://about.me/jesse-friedman

Toolbox:

Site Critiques

We will be continuing site critiques from our January meetup. We will continue from the original list of sites (https://spreadsheets.google.com/ccc?key=0AjBbyTiaQOBNdDlSWEhpNEdzUkpiQ3BwbWdKNXQ4bFE&hl=en&authkey=CPvtnd8M) (starting after the site highlighted in red).  If we have gone over your site, please feel free to submit another one. We will order those towards the end in the event we do not have enough sites.

Remember, take these critiques lightly. They are meant to help your site reach its fullest potential!

Agenda

  • 7-7:30pm - Networking & Pizza
  • 7:30-7:40pm - Opening remarks, updates, any other business
  • 7:45-8:50pm - Sessions begin
  • 8:50-9pm - Wrap-up
item.name: BWPM Apr 2011 - Dev/Design: Unpack WordPress Today & Toolbox: Site Critiques
